channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Report: AI coding assistants aren’t a panacea
item.description: As they gain in popularity, AI coding assistants such as GitHub Copilot may appear to be boosting productivity. But in reality, they could be causing ...

item.title: The Best Meat Subscription Boxes, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: Get grass-fed beef, pastured pork, and free-range chicken delivered to your door no matter where you live.

item.title: Apple pulls iCloud end-to-end encryption feature for UK users after government demanded backdoor
item.description: In an unprecedented step, Apple caved to a reported U.K. government’s demand to prevent users from using end-to-end encryption in iCloud. © 2024 TechC...

item.title: DeepSeek to open-source parts of online services code
item.description: Chinese AI lab DeepSeek plans to open-source portions of its online services’ code as part of an “open source week” event next week. DeepSeek will ope...

item.title: 16 Best Crossplay Games for Consoles and PC (2025): Xbox, PlayStation, Switch, Mobile
item.description: These titles let you play with friends on all kinds of platforms, from computers to Xbox, PlayStation, Switch, and even mobile.

item.title: Roll Over Shakespeare: ChatGPT Is Here
item.description: Theater productions Doomers and McNeal tackle AI’s impact on humanity and the creative process.

item.title: Did a Rock Hit Your Windshield, or Did Your Windshield Hit a Rock?
item.description: Either way, it sucks. But at least there’s some fun physics to ponder while you’re sitting in the repair shop.

item.title: The Ozempic Shortage Is Over
item.description: The semaglutide shortage has officially ended in the US—which means the GLP-1 drug industry is about to undergo massive changes.
